show_players_message: No active players. Show you players with the eye button on the top again or add new players.
no_player_message: There's no player yet. Please add players first.
hidden_player_info: Hidden player won't be shown in the player selection. Out of this reason you don't have to delete players, which would break your saved scores.
show_player_info: Press the eye to show hidden players again.
no_saved_gamers: No player found. Please add some in 'Player Overview' first.
min_letters_message: A name has to be 2 letters at least.
max_letters_message: A name can have 9 letters at maximum.
cant_save_wrong_entries: It's not possible to save wrong entries. Please correct them first.
really_delete_data: Really delete all data? Deleted data can't be restored again.
really_delete_game: Really delete this game? Deleted data can't be restored again.
